description: This is an advanced course in the area of political thought. The topic, either a detailed study of major works or themes in political philosophy, will vary with each offering. Prerequisite: Political Science 220 and one other course in political thought.
name: Studies Pol Thought
prerequisites: Political Science 220 and one other course in political thought.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Political Science 220 and one other course in political thought.

title: Seminar in Political Theory
